task.title: Resetting the Origin
task.shortdesc: You can reset the origin when you want the to process all available data instead of processing data from the last-saved offset. Reset the origin when the pipeline is not running.

context.p:
pipelinesresetting the originoriginsresetting the originYou can reset the origin for the following origin stages:
Directory
File Tail
JDBC Consumer
Kinesis Consumer For these origins, when you stop the pipeline, the notes where it stopped processing data. When you restart the pipeline, it continues from where it left off by default. When you want the to process all available data instead of continuing from where it stopped, reset the origin.

To change the starting point for a Kafka Consumer, update the offset in the Kafka ZooKeeper. For details, see the Kafka documentation. The remaining origin stages process transient data where resetting the origin has no effect.

step.cmd: To reset the origin, click the More icon.
In the Reset Origin Confirmation dialog box, click Yes to reset the origin.
